lexUnit.name: fingertip.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the tip of the finger

sentence.text: Place the fingertips of both hands on your shoulders , bending your arms at the elbow .
ABOVE Part of a Kirlian photograph of the fingertip of a drug addict .
This is a consideration of principle rather than practical reality , since the relevant law is often obscure , and unlikely to be at the fingertips of the qualified lawyer let alone the layman .
She sighed , her pale brow resting on the fingertips of the ringed hand .
Trembling helplessly , she pressed her hands against his chest , her fingertips of their own volition moving through the short , rough curly hair to brush the hard , flat nipples of his chest .
Keep your wrists loose , elbows at right angles , and tap your fingertips quickly and rhythmically over the area .
Shares will boom and John Major will cling on by his fingertips .
A soft white muslin that , when Tsu Ma knelt and gently brushed it with his fingertips , reminded him strangely of springtime and the smell of young girls .

Her fingertips had only fluttered around him in butterfly ecstasy .
He placed his fingertips on the small shoulder-blades and ran them down the silk skin of the back , over the already girlish waist to the round buttocks .
Raise your head and shoulders , placing your right fingertips on your left knee .
Repeat the exercise , but place your left fingertips onto your right knee .
" Nancy touched fingertips to his cheek .
He pressed his fingertips against his brow .
He kissed her fingertips again .
He rested his elbows on the desk , supporting his chin with fingertips .

He kissed her fingertips again , making her shiver .

She bent double and stayed that way , and her brown hair hung down , and her little fingertips touched the ground .
` We told Siobhan to come to the window-ledge and to hang down holding on by her fingertips .
Although she could just about reach the top shelf with her fingertips , she was very unsteady .
Dozing on the plane he felt the smoothness of the assassin 's face in his fingertips , the tumble of hair he 'd taken to be Jude 's over the back of his hands .
His fingertip barely touched the place it should have been , but the smile had faded , replaced by tension , and Luke 's eyes darkened in response to the turbulence that had entered hers .
Her fingertips were numb where they were pressing into the stone wall behind her .
Susan 's head lay where she had rested it , one arm curled round , the other hanging so that her fingertips brushed the floorboards .
` See here , " he said , and his fingertip brushed Culley 's eyelash .
His fingertips brushed the inner flesh of her thighs , and suddenly he bent his head and pressed kisses to that most sensitive of soft flesh .
